extendedInfo.description: "Monster Catch" is fun and simple action game.Throw the arm again and again and catch the monster as many as possible.-Gameplay-When the arm is swung from side to side, press the "Catch" button at the right time, you can catch the monster. Angle and timing of arm is important to catch the monster.-Stage-When you exceed the setting score that you are required to, you can play the stage of next level.Try to complete all stages!-Item-It might be not easy to get rare and strong monster. If you really want to get the such monster, one way is to use better ocarina and stronger arm.Ocarina: the higher level one, the more monsters are appeared.Arm: the higher level one, the faster and stronger throwing.-Rnking-This game has international and domestic ranking. Can you put your name on the leaderboard also?

reviews.title: It was okay.
reviews.comment: It was okay but the ad placement is really inconvenient and the game just doesn\'t look very good. The dynamics are basically like gold mining games.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cute but...
reviews.comment: Just like everyone is saying,  you don\'t earn coins to buy upgrade. You hit a point where you have to pay to play because your crane simply isn\'t fast enough. Otherwise, it is quite cute.
reviews.author: Kel Card

reviews.comment: i loaded up the game,enjoyed it, but after buying an upgrade i ccoulnt earn a coin
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap game
reviews.comment: After you buy an upgrade its only good for one level and you don\'t earn upgrades our coins it sucks just a way to take money from you with out you getting anything in return boo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Rerly fun just needs a few more lvls
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need a way to earn coins for free
reviews.comment: It seems like it could be a good addictive game except it sucks cause u can\'t earn coins to buy upgrades unless u purchase the coins.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hmm...
reviews.comment: Ok no coments yet? Games ok.
